title: ollama/ollama
summary: Official Ollama repository providing the CLI and server to pull, run, and manage large language models locally.

title: ollama-python
summary: Official Python client library for Ollama, offering sync/async APIs and streaming support.

title: ollama-js
summary: Official JavaScript/TypeScript client for Node and browsers to interact with the Ollama server.

title: langchain-ollama
summary: LangChain integration package that wraps Ollama models for use in LangChain chains and agents.

title: ollama-webui
summary: Feature-rich chat web UI for Ollama (renamed to Open WebUI) with model management and RAG support.

title: open-webui
summary: Successor of ollama-webui; an open-source WebUI for Ollama, supporting local LLM chats, docs, images.

title: ollama-cli
summary: Community-built interactive TUI for Ollama with chat history and model switching.

title: ollama-copilot
summary: VS Code extension bringing Ollama models into GitHub Copilot-like inline suggestions.

title: ollama-haystack
summary: Haystack integration enabling Ollama models as generators in Haystack 2.0 pipelines.

title: ollama-rag
summary: Lightweight RAG example using Ollama embeddings and llama.cpp for vector search.

title: ollama-npm
summary: Official npm package providing JS/TS bindings to communicate with the local Ollama server.

title: ollama-py
summary: Official PyPI package exposing Ollama REST APIs via simple Python functions.

title: ollama4j
summary: Java/Kotlin client library for Ollama with Spring Boot starters and reactive support.

title: ollama-discord
summary: Self-hostable Discord bot that lets servers chat with local Ollama models via slash commands.

title: ollama-slack
summary: Slack bot integration for Ollama supporting threaded conversations and app mentions.

title: ollama-helm
summary: Helm chart to deploy Ollama server and models on Kubernetes with GPU autoscaling.

title: ollama-dagger
summary: Dagger module that spins up Ollama containers in CI pipelines for testing LLM calls.

title: ollama-rust
summary: Rust crate providing strongly-typed async bindings to the Ollama REST API.
